dashboard.strong_experience: I have {years} years of extensive experience and have built several projects from the ground up.
dashboard.chickenderby_description: Chickenderby is a betting platform that utilizes blockchain technology, and I served as the lead developer.
dashboard.gogograndparent_description: GoGoGrandparent is an on-demand service tailored for seniors and individuals, and I served as the Vue developer.
dashboard.coachcare_description: CoachCare provides remote patient monitoring and virtual health solutions, and I served as the Angular developer.
dashboard.looter_description: Looter is a multi-chain purchasing tool and listing sniper built on blockchain technology, and I served as the Rust developer.
dashboard.web_development_description: I developed Chickendery using React, Coachcare with Angular, GoGoGrandparent with Vue, and Looter using Next.js.
dashboard.blockchain_development_description: I integrated several blockchains, including Solana, Ethereum, and Binance Smart Chain.
dashboard.database_development_description: I specialize in MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL. I built the database from scratch in Looter using PostgreSQL TimescaleDB.
dashboard.game_development_description: I implemented features to support thousands of concurrent players in Chickendery.
dashboard.mobile_development_description: I developed the Coachcare app using React Native and the Drayberya app using Flutter.
dashboard.name: name
